body.name: TOUCAN 360-Degree Video Conference Camera, 1080p HD Webcam with 4 Noise Reduction Mics, Speaker, AI Tracking, Works with Zoom, Google Voice, Microsoft Teams and More, for PC/Mac/Laptop/MacBook/Tablet
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 21 hrs 18 mins
features: High-definition Image Quality: Our conference camera delivers crystal-clear visuals, ensuring every detail is visible during presentations, slideshows, and video conferences. Experience a vivid and lifelike display that enhances your meeting.

Superior Microphone: Equipped with a high-quality microphone, our webcam captures voices with precision, ensuring clear and audible communication. Your voice will be heard loud and clear, improving overall meeting effectiveness

Plug-and-play Convenience: Our conference camera supports instant plug-and-play functionality, eliminating the need for complicated setup and installation. Simply connect the 4K webcam to your computer or conference device, and you're ready to start the meeting. It's that easy and time-saving

Universally Compatibility: Our conference web cam offers broad compatibility, seamlessly integrating with various conference software and devices. Whether you use Zoom, Microsoft Teams, or any other conferencing platform, you can effortlessly connect and ensure smooth meetings

Adaptability To Any Conference Room: Our conference camera is designed to fit seamlessly into conference rooms of all sizes. Whether it's a small meeting room or a large conference hall, it delivers exceptional video and audio transmission, ensuring every participant enjoys a high-quality conference experience

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TOUCAN Conference Camera Conference Room Camera TOUCAN Conference Camera features； 1>4Pcs 1080p HD cameras that capture 1080p HD 360° views 2>4k webcam is equipped with four microphones that have a pickup range of up to 18' (5.5m) . 3>Universally compatible with a wide range of electronic devices, as well as with almost all web-based video conferencing platforms. Adapt to the perfect use of large, medium and small mixed conference rooms. 4>Five different conference visualization modes to meet different meeting needs, adapting to large and small conference room meetings, online class presentations and discussions. 5>Plug-and-play simplicity webcam, no software to install, and no need to configure complex settings

Conference Webcam with Echo-canceling Omnidirectional Microphone Webcam with Omnidirectional Microphone Omni-directional position noise canceling microphone Features: Number of Microphones; 3Pcs Pickup range; 18' (5.5m) Filters background noise and picks up your voice clearly Easily capture the voice you want in noisy environments Meanwhile, the latest voice AI tracking technology enables the screen to automatically focus on the speaker.

360° Panoramic View 4 Diffterent Display Modes Conference Room Webcam Features Number of Cameras; 4Pcs Capture wide angle range; 360° Video resolution; 1920*1080P Frame rate ; 30 fps Display modes; 4 The conference room meeting camera can provide 4 different meeting visualization modes to meet different meeting needs and adapt to various meeting scenarios. Whether it is a large or small conference room meeting, or online class presentation and discussion.

Universally Compatible with Most Computer or Mobile Conference Applications Universally compatible with devices: for PCs, laptops, Macs, tablets, streaming media, video calls. Compatible platforms; Zoom, GoToMeeting, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, Cisco Webex, BlueJeans, Skype, Facetime, Facebook, YouTube and more!

Webcams for All Kinds of Meeting Rooms The TOUCAN webcam features a 4-lens streaming camera and an 18-foot audio pickup range; just two conference cameras paired together can extend the video and audio range in larger spaces. Perfect for a mix of small, medium and large meeting rooms.
Suitable for Remote Guidance of Live Streaming Camera
Suitable for Classroom Training Online Class Training Webcam It can be used as a camera for online class live broadcast, remote training live broadcast, and online course camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear and sharp picture
reviews.reviewText: Got it for web conferencing and online learning. Clearer than the installed cam on my new laptop 💻 (not a cheapie either). Only wish the field of view could be adjusted to narrow the width or cropped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Muy buen producto
reviews.reviewText: Un gran producto, tiene una buena resolución y las diferentes opciones de camara son muy oportunas para cada situación.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for meeting rooms
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best units I've seen for your typical video conference call meeting room setup to hold 6-12 people. You can place this center table and everyone is capable of being heard and seen without the unit itself or it's function become a distraction - looking at you PTZ cameras. PTZ's are great for streaming training or whiteboard presentations, but for a sit down smaller group video conference call, this unit is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is great for doing virtual meetings. The camera quality is great and so is the sound quality. Setting it up for use is very simple, just follow the instructions, its just a few steps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pros: it can respond to where the sound/ movement is coming from and the camera will switch to focus on that person.Cons: video on mine wasn't very clear, especially compared to a much cheaper Webcam I have.Sometimes the video doesn't switch to the correct side very well. There's 4 cameras around the the top. At first it wouldn't focus on me from one camera, the only area I was showing up was from half of two different cameras (so the two made one complete picture). The only issue is there was a blurry line down the middle of the screen because of the gap between the two camera lenses.Also the audio was actually exceptionally poor.I was eventually able to get a single camera to focus on me, but still it wasn't the best picture and the sound is still bad.I would not recommend this for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sleek camera for conference calls, works with Zoom & Teams
reviews.reviewText: I got this camera to use for business meetings and like how sleek & modern it looks. The camera system is well made and feels solid. I thought the camera would rotate to face whomever is speaking, however, there are 4 camera at the top and they are able to detect who is speaking and focus on that person. There are 4 different modes of view, which includes a 360 degree view of the room. If you are just one person, you can set the view to Focus, which is similar to a webcam view.The system is plug & play and easy to use. The picture and sound quality are both good. At the time of this review, the camera was priced at $500 with a $150 coupon. I feel the sale price is reasonable if you are buying this for a conference room or need to accommodate 3 or more people in a room. However, if it's just you, I found the webcam built into my laptop works just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plug-and-play full room video and audio
reviews.reviewText: In our office we have a conference room camera system (eponymously named after a large-eyed bird), though I can't just take that with me to a different office or when traveling. This Toucan 360-Degree Video Conference Camera is an intriguing alternative. Out of the box, I plugged it in with the included AC adapter and USB cable and it just worked. My laptop recognized it and Teams selected it as an available video and audio source. I prefer that the controls are on the hardware, and do not require any software installs, since it makes for a more consistent experience when moving between computers and locations. The buttons on the top of the unit are capacitive (not physical) so you'll probably have to look to see what your pressing, though they do seem responsive. It's easy to switch between the difference views (split, focus, grid, and panorama), and the "focus" setting can lock onto a single person if they're using this as an independent webcam.Some small considerations (@Toucan - are you reading this?): when exiting out of a video meeting the camera will remember the mode I was in, but not the view, so focus defaults to the camera at the 3-o'clock position rather than over the LED indicator light; this is a small thing, but when I start a meeting I have to wait for the camera to focus on me and they use the button to lock the view again (rather than the unit just remembering it's last setting). The camera head comes off (and there is even an included plug to cover the connector on the top of the unit) but the Toucan didn't come with a carrying case. It's about the size of two soup cans (with the camera head removed), so while not large, it's still more than I can just toss in my laptop bag. I'm actually using a soft case for a telephoto camera lens, and that protects the body of the unit perfectly.So is this a good buy? For easy and portable video/audio conferencing it's a compelling choice, and for use in conference room where you don't have to pack it up and transport it, then it's a very competitive option. For solo use, I don't think the cost outweighs the webcam already built into my laptop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my business partner who does a lot of video calls. So far, she's learning how to use all of the cool features. She loves it. It's a really nice upgrade from using a phone or basic web cam. It arrived in great conditon and seems to be working well.
